articles.title: Pope Francis says Italian seminaries should reject gay applicants - America: The Jesuit Review
articles.description: Pope Francis told the Italian bishops’ conference not to allow homosexual men to enter the seminary to train for the priesthood, according to Italian media reports.
articles.content:
Pope Francis told the Italian bishops conference not to allow homosexual men to enter the seminary to train for the priesthood, according to Italian media reports.
The popes words took many by surpr… [+4911 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Furiosa’ Just Barely Beats ‘The Garfield Movie’ in Disastrous Memorial Day Weekend — the Worst in Decades - Variety
articles.description: In a box office nail biter, "Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga" emerged victorious over "The Garfield Movie" on North American charts.
articles.content:
Garfield has another reason to hate Mondays.
In a box office nail biter, “Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga” narrowly emerged victorious over “The Garfield Movie” on North American charts. On Sunday, Warner B… [+2321 chars]
